column2: "Ooh, nice killing out there. Oh, and I saw your report. A blood-soaked thing of beauty it was!"
"Twin machineguns are all about grinding hostiles into hamburger meat, and making sure they suffer big time before they die!"
"Anyway, those twin machine guns seem to fit your hands like a glove, so why don't you just keep them?"
"Oh, and I'm completely satisfied with this report, so..."
"Keep up the good work with those twin machine guns. And make sure to torment lots and lots of hostiles before you kill them, okay?"

"A new Client Order is available for Barbara.

Barbara can be found in the Gate Area, second floor."
